short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulate live interview experience by hiding failed test cases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to hide test case when wrong answer is submitted on Leetcode. This feature simulates realistic coding round experience where test cases are not shown. Toggle easily between hidden and visible test case mode. Syncs your saved settings across all devices.
